item.title: Amazon EC2
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Apache Log4j2 Security Bulletin (CVE-2021-44228) (amazon.com) https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ fix https://alas.aws.amazon.com/cve/html/CVE-2021-44228.html Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Packages for Amazon Linux 1 and 2 not affected, package for Amazon Linux 2022 is CISAGov Last Update: 12/15/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-14 15:24:48 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Amazon ElastiCache
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Amazon ElastiCache completed patching the Apache Log4j2 issue Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-15 15:10:26 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon EMR
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Vulnerable only if affected EMR releases are used and untrusted sources are configured to be processed Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated communityNotVulnerable. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon Kafka (MSK)
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Applying updates as required, portion of customers may still be vulnerable. Some MSK-specific service components use Log4j > 2.0.0 library and are being patched where needed Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Amazon Kinesis Data Streams
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL KCL 2.x, KCL 1.14.5 or higher, and KPL are not vulnerable Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon Lake Formation
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Update in progress, portion of customers may still be vulnerable. AWS Lake Formation service hosts are being updated to the latest version of Log4j Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow (MWAA)
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Completed all required updates to the MWAA service code to address the issue Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists. Updated community link source. Updated community note.
